metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36658 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Apache::Session::LDAP before 0.5, validity of the X.509 certificate is not checked by default when connecting to remote LDAP backends, because the default configuration of the Net::LDAPS module for Perl is used. NOTE: this can, for example, be fixed in conjunction with the CVE-2020-16093 fix.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36658` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache-session-ldap-perl - 0.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libapache-session-ldap-perl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.5-1').
